name: Dataminr Pulse for Splunk SOAR
description: Pulse's AI-powered real-time intelligence integrates into Splunk SOAR workflows for faster detection and response
latest_tested_versions: Mar 31, 2024, Dataminr Pulse, API v2 v3

list_names.description: List Names (comma-seperated values allowed). NOTE: If this field is blank and query is provided, it will ingest alerts from all the watchlists of the Dataminr Pulse account

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Retrieve the list of all the watchlists
Fetch the details of the alerts from the Dataminr platform for the given List ID or query

use_asset_configured_lists.description: Use lists as configured in asset parameter

max_alerts.description: Maximum number of alerts to fetch

example_values:
IP: 0.0.0.0
ASN: AS0000
ASN HOST: Company
COUNTRY: Country
CITY: City
TAGS: Tag
FIRST SEEN: 2018-11-14

actions.description: Fetch the details of the related alert from the Dataminr platform for the given Alert ID
Ingest alerts from Dataminr using Dataminr Pulse API
